name: Dost Education
headline: Getting kids ready for school in India.
description:
Dost is an ed-tech nonprofit building a platform to expand access to early childhood development in low-resource settings through parent education. Our mission is to unlock children’s full potential by focusing on early learning - the time when 90% of our brains develop.

We believe that parents of any literacy level can play a critical role in developing their children’s school and life readiness. In India alone, there are 150 million under-resourced caregivers who can benefit from resources developed for them. That’s why our team at Dost Education - educators, entrepreneurs, and engineers - are passionate about using technology and user-centric product design to change the trajectory of families’ lives.

Since 2017, we’ve grown from a small pilot with a few hundred mothers, to reaching over 100,000 families working with state governments. Join us as we continue to innovate, grow our reach, and deepen our impact. We are supported by some of the best funders in tech and social impact space like Y Combinator, Mulago, and many others.

Dost Education values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

founders.name: Sindhuja Jeyabal, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Sindhuja has expertise building digital learning experiences and is passionate about making quality education accessible to everyone. She has worked across user-centered design, product development and engineering at Samsung and Adobe to build engaging digital experiences that make learning fun. Sindhuja received her Masters from UC Berkeley, where she specialized in technology for international development and began building Dost.

founders.name: Sneha Sheth, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Sneha is passionate about using entrepreneurship to solve educational inequality in the world. She started Dost while completing her MBA at UC Berkeley. She has experience designing programs for women’s empowerment, financial inclusion and education across the world. In previous roles, she advised clients like Goldman Sachs, the Gates Foundation, Teach For India, and UN Women. She’s a Mulago Rainer Arnhold Fellow and GLG Social Impact Fellow.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a418cf99e2b9291a5007_asset%2011.webp)
# Empowering parents to be leaders
Our vision is that every child is school ready
[हिंदी](http://www.dosteducation.com/</home-hindi>)
## A global problem
All parents are motivated to give their children the best education,but many resource constrained families struggle to do so, particularly in the early years.Experts agree on a cost-effective yet overlooked approach to address this cycle of illiteracy: empower parents to promote early childhood development at home.
## An untapped opportunity
**Dost Education** empowers parents of any literacy level to take charge of their child’s early education.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a416703762a059b0135b_asset%202.webp)
### A PROVEN MECHANISM
Evidence-based, parent approved
Getting kids school ready is not rocket science! We take the proven science behind early childhood development and turn it into actionable steps for parents of ANY literacy level to embed into daily routines.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a41615104401373b2765_asset%203.webp)
### A SCALABLE APPROACH
A phone call from a friend
We create short, friendly audio content that reaches parents where they already are: their mobile phones. Dost is cost-effective at scale without compromising on the ability to personalize content.
## Sign up for Dost
Give us a missed call at: 01140844943
## Partners
Interested in piloting Dost in your community? Email us here.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/65423a0d37c73522af24cd8c_UNICEF-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a417ae65d6d2b55870e6_asset%205.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/65423a0dc58efbacc96a770e_isli%20logo.jpeg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a4176138e4eb281841d7_asset%207.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/65423a0d64ad9975e218229e_corp%20logo.jpeg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a418424b8a7e3b7ed258_asset%209.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/64e8a417ce63f69e940d2ca8_asset%2010.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e8762409760d7f6308c162/65423b3b87acbcf99ebf5d05_Ekstep%20logo.svg)

generated_description:
**Dost Education: Empowering Parents for a Brighter Future**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator’s W17 batch, Dost Education is a nonprofit based in Delhi, India, committed to ensuring that every child is ready for school. The organization has a clear mission: to improve early childhood development in low-resource settings through parent education. With an impressive journey from a pilot project involving a few hundred mothers to reaching over 100,000 families, Dost Education is leveraging the power of technology and user-centric design to transform the lives of families across India.

### The Need for Early Childhood Development

In India, there are about 150 million under-resourced caregivers. These individuals, regardless of their literacy level, play a crucial role in their children’s education and life readiness. Experts agree that enhancing parents' capabilities is a cost-effective way to address the cycle of illiteracy and promote early childhood development. Dost Education fills this gap by providing accessible educational resources tailored for all parents.

### Innovative Approach

Dost’s model is refreshing and grounded in proven strategies. They create simple, actionable steps based on scientific research that parents can easily integrate into their daily routines. Recognizing that parents already carry mobile phones, Dost leverages this by delivering short, friendly audio content directly to families. This approach not only personalizes the learning experience but also scales effectively without losing relevance.

### A Diverse and Passionate Team

With a team of 30 dedicated professionals, Dost Education comprises educators, entrepreneurs, and engineers all driven by a shared passion for creating impactful change. The organization also aligns itself with principles of diversity and inclusivity, ensuring that all families can benefit from its programs.

### Support and Community Engagement

Dost Education is supported by esteemed funders in both the tech and social impact spaces, including Y Combinator and Mulago. The organization thrives on community involvement, welcoming interested partners to pilot their initiatives in various communities.

### Join the Movement

Dost Education invites everyone to be a part of this transformative journey. By empowering parents as leaders in early education, they are not just preparing children for school but paving the way for a future where each child's potential can truly flourish.

For more information or to support their mission, visit [Dost Education’s website](http://www.dosteducation.com/).
